english.segment1: I've been walking around with my heart in my hand. I might ask you if you could ever understand. I can't take another break in my heart. So let me show you darling where to start
english.segment2: You think you know how to love me. But I think you might go and tear me apart. You think you know how to show me. But I could use a few less breaks in my heart
english.segment3: If there ever was a big mistake I made. I'm still broke from all the prices that I paid. I can't bring myself to linger in the past. I need something that I know is gonna last
english.segment4: You think you know how to love me. But I think you might go and tear me apart. You think you know how to show me. But I could use a few less breaks in my heart
